examples.example: 我喜欢在午餐时享用美味的沙拉，感觉既健康又清爽。

translate.english: I like to enjoy delicious salad during lunch, feeling both healthy and refreshing.

examples.example: 我今天自己动手做了一份营养丰富的沙拉，吃起来十分美味。

translate.english: I made a nutritious salad by myself today and it tastes very delicious.

examples.example: 每当我想要保持身材时，都会选择美味的沙拉作为我的晚餐。

translate.english: Whenever I want to keep fit, I will choose delicious salad as my dinner.
